A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The Last Jedi\, remember that this film is part 2 of 3\, you get some stuff answered not much it raises new questions.

Except for the "Darth plagues" story in Revenge of the sith and the original trilogy (where everything had to be built) NO ONE FILM adds as MUCH to the LORE to star wars than "The last Jedi" does.

Incredible work\, it has elements\, nods and a few echoes to both other trilogies but it is NOT slapped in your face like it was with "The Force Awakens"

Finally everyone and just remember the Writer and director are the same person Rian Johnson and he loves to screw with your mind!

DON'T\, believe EVERYTHING you see or EVERYTHING  you hear in the film some is misdirection!
